title: Ride Concepts Introduces the Hellion Collection
content:
Ride Concepts introduces the latest generation of Hellion and Hellion Elite shoes.  Available in men’s and women’s fits, flat and clip for all styles. 

HELLION

Engineered for big days on the bike, Hellion blends lightweight breathability with aggressive trail capability. A traditional lace closure keeps things simple and secure, while the molded EVA midsole delivers all-day comfort and efficient power transfer.

Key Features:

  • Lightweight bonded upper featuring Cordura® mesh for breathability and durability
  • CLIP GRIP rubber outsole (CLIP) / MAX GRIP rubber outsole (FLAT)
  • 40mm long cleat box with index markings for precise cleat placement (CLIP)
  • RC PowerDrive nylon shank for efficient power transfer and lateral stiffness (CLIP)
  • Hexagon outsole with reverse hex relief on toe and heel for hike-a-bike traction
  • EVA midsole for support and shock absorption
  • Fully gusseted tongue to block dirt and debris
  • D3O® High Impact Zone insole for impact protection and fatigue reduction
  • Anti-bacterial mesh lining to control odor
  • TPU mud guard for added durability and abrasion resistance
  • Hellion MSRP: $160 USD / $210 CAD / 160 EUR / $279 AUD / 144.95 GBP
  • Hellion Clip MSRP: $180 USD / $235 CAD / 180 EUR / $319 AUD / 154.95 GBP

HELLION BOA® 

Hellion gets a precision upgrade with the BOA® Fit System, delivering micro-adjustable control and all-day comfort wrapped into a breathable Cordura® upper. The PerformFit™ Wrap secures the foot for improved power transfer and climbing efficiency

Key Features:

  • Cordura® mesh upper for breathability and abrasion resistance
  • PerformFit™ Wrap powered by BOA® Li2 dial and TX4 lace for precision fit
  • CLIP GRIP rubber outsole (CLIP) / MAX GRIP rubber outsole (FLAT)
  • 40mm cleat box with extended runway for fit tuning (CLIP)
  • RC PowerDrive nylon shank for pedaling stiffness (CLIP)
  • Hexagon outsole with reverse hex for hike-a-bike sections
  • EVA midsole, fully gusseted tongue, and D3O® insole
  • Anti-bacterial lining and TPU mud guard
  • Hellion BOA® MSRP: $190 USD / $240 CAD / 190 EUR / $339 AUD / 179.95 GBP
  • Hellion BOA® Clip MSRP: $210 USD / $275 CAD / 210 EUR / $369 AUD / 189.95 GBP

HELLION ELITE BOA®

Designed for enduro racers and park rats. Built with a Cordura® and KPU upper for maximum durability, it features an asymmetrical collar, molded heel counter, and KPU armor where it counts. The BOA® Fit System with PerformFit™ Wrap.

Key Features:

  • Cordura® and molded KPU upper for impact protection and durability
  • BOA® Fit System with PerformFit™ Wrap for micro-adjustable precision fit
  • KPU mud guard, toe protector, and heel counter for added stability
  • Molded KPU protection over BOA dial
  • CLIP GRIP rubber outsole (CLIP) / MAX GRIP rubber outsole (FLAT)
  • 40mm cleat box for extended cleat adjustability (CLIP)
  • RC PowerDrive nylon shank and EVA midsole for power and support
  • Hexagon outsole with reverse hex relief for grip on hike-a-bike sections
  • D3O® insole, gusseted tongue, anti-bacterial mesh lining
  • Hellion Elite BOA® MSRP: $230 USD / $300 CAD / 230 EUR / $399 AUD / 209.95 GBP
  • Hellion Elite BOA® Clip MSRP: $250 USD / $325 CAD / 250 EUR / $449 AUD / 219.95 GBP
